title: EPIC HAKI CLASH!! LUFFY VS CHINJAO [One Piece 646]

title: One Piece Episode 646 Reaction

title: 645-647: Destruction Cannon Blasts! Lucy in Trouble!, The Legendary Pirate! Don Chinjao! and Light and Darkness! The Shadow Behind Dressrosa!
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A first-time viewer's review and reaction to episodes 645-647 of One Piece, covering the Block C battles including episode 646 with Don Chinjao.

title: Chao Time: Kung Hei Fat Sai
author: The One Piece Podcast
description: An editorial article analyzing Don Chinjao's character, explaining that he is based on Chinese deities, especially regarding his drill-shaped head and elderly appearance.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains analysis of Don Chinjao's character arc through the Corrida Colosseum

title: One Piece Chapter 719 Review
author: The Good Kind of Reviews
description: A review of One Piece Chapter 719, which covers content that appears in episodes around 646, including the Chinjao vs Garp backstory.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains manga spoilers for the Corrida Colosseum arc

title: One Piece Chapter 719 - The Return Of The Drill
author: 12Dimension
description: An analysis of Chapter 719 discussing Chinjao's drill head, his history with Garp, and speculation about Luffy restoring his head.
